title: Lockpick

fields.name: For example:
fields.value: Using this card on (1000) Croatia may give you (378) Brass Knuckles and (622) Exploding Kitten

desc:
Post 1952
- Input an even number to use this card.
- Split one other card in your hand into two random **Ethereal** cards, with post numbers that add up to the post number of the split card.
- If you split Post 1, you just get two **Ethereal** Post 1s.
